import { useState } from "react"; import "./RegisterPage.css"; export default function Registerpage() { const initialStateErrors = { name: { required: false }, email: { required: false }, mobileNumber: { required: true }, password: { required: true }, role: { required: true }, custom_error: null, }; const [errors, setErrors] = useState(initialStateErrors); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false); const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); let updateErrors = initialStateErrors; if (inputs.name === "") { updateErrors.name.required = true; } setErrors(updateErrors); }; const [inputs, setInputs] = useState({ name: "", email: "", mobileNumber: "", password: "", role: "", }); const handleInput = (e) => { setInputs({ ...inputs, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; return (

Welcome to Retalio

Retalio is a platform where both retailers and customers come together to buy or sell and stay connected to fulfil their needs

{errors.name.required ? ( Name is required. ) : null}
{errors.email.required ? ( Email is required. ) : null}
{errors.mobileNumber.require ? ( MobileNo is required. ) : null}
{errors.password.require ? ( Password is required. ) : null}
Please select a role

: null} {loading ? (

); }
